org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser
Class MarkupParser

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.mylyn.wikitext.core.parser.MarkupParser

public class MarkupParser
extends Object

A markup processor that can process lightweight markup formats such as Textile.

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Green
